t: Mark 2
The Paralytic Healed
When*p He had come back to Capernaum several days afterward, it was heard that He was at home.
And many were gathered together, so that there was no longer room, not even near the door; and He was speaking the word to them.
And they came, bringing to Him a paralytic, carried by four men.
Being unable to get to Him because of the crowd, they removed the roof above Him; and when they had dug an opening, they let down the pallet on which the paralytic was lying.
And Jesus seeing their faith said to the paralytic, “Son,*r your*r sins*r are*r forgiven.”*r
But some of the scribes were sitting there and reasoning in their hearts,
“Why does this man speak that way? He is blaspheming; who can forgive sins but God alone?”
Immediately Jesus, aware in His spirit that they were reasoning that way within themselves, said to them, “Why*r are*r you*r reasoning*r about*r these*r things*r in*r your*r hearts?*r
Which*r is*r easier,*r to*r say*r to*r the*r paralytic,*r ‘Your*r sins*r are*r forgiven’;*r or*r to*r say,*r ‘Get*r up,*r and*r pick*r up*r your*r pallet*r and*r walk’?*r
But*r so*r that*r you*r may*r know*r that*r the*r Son*r of*r Man*r has*r authority*r on*r earth*r to*r forgive*r sins”*r —He said to the paralytic,
“I*r say*r to*r you,*r get*r up,*r pick*r up*r your*r pallet*r and*r go*r home.”*r
And he got up and immediately picked up the pallet and went out in the sight of everyone, so that they were all amazed and were glorifying God, saying, “We have never seen anything like this.”
And*p He went out again by the seashore; and all the people were coming to Him, and He was teaching them.
Levi (Matthew) Called
As*p He passed by, He saw Levi the son*i of Alphaeus sitting in the tax booth, and He said to him, “Follow*r Me!”*r And he got up and followed Him.

And*p it happened that He was reclining at*i the*i table*i in his house, and many tax collectors and sinners were dining with Jesus and His disciples; for there were many of them, and they were following Him.
When the scribes of the Pharisees saw that He was eating with the sinners and tax collectors, they said to His disciples, “Why is He eating and drinking with tax collectors and sinners?”

And hearing this,*i Jesus said to them, “It*ir is*ir not*r those*r who*r are*r healthy*r who*r need*r a*r physician,*r but*r those*r who*r are*r sick;*r I*r did*r not*r come*r to*r call*r the*r righteous,*r but*r sinners.”*r
John’s*p disciples and the Pharisees were fasting; and they came and said to Him, “Why do John’s disciples and the disciples of the Pharisees fast, but Your disciples do not fast?”

And Jesus said to them, “While*r the*r bridegroom*r is*r with*r them,*r the*r attendants*r of*r the*r bridegroom*r cannot*r fast,*r can*r they?*r So*r long*r as*r they*r have*r the*r bridegroom*r with*r them,*r they*r cannot*r fast.*r
But*r the*r days*r will*r come*r when*r the*r bridegroom*r is*r taken*r away*r from*r them,*r and*r then*r they*r will*r fast*r in*r that*r day.*r

“No*rp one*r sews*r a*r patch*r of*r unshrunk*r cloth*r on*r an*r old*r garment;*r otherwise*r the*r patch*r pulls*r away*r from*r it,*r the*r new*r from*r the*r old,*r and*r a*r worse*r tear*r results.*r

No*r one*r puts*r new*r wine*r into*r old*r wineskins;*r otherwise*r the*r wine*r will*r burst*r the*r skins,*r and*r the*r wine*r is*r lost*r and*r the*r skins*r as*ir well;*ir but*r one*ir puts*ir new*r wine*r into*r fresh*r wineskins.”*r
Question of the Sabbath
And*p it happened that He was passing through the grainfields on the Sabbath, and His disciples began to make their way along while picking the heads of*i grain.*i
The Pharisees were saying to Him, “Look, why are they doing what is not lawful on the Sabbath?”
And He said to them, “Have*r you*r never*r read*r what*r David*r did*r when*r he*r was*r in*r need*r and*r he*r and*r his*r companions*r became*r hungry;*r

how*r he*r entered*r the*r house*r of*r God*r in*r the*r time*r of*r Abiathar*r the*ir high*r priest,*r and*r ate*r the*r consecrated*r bread,*r which*r is*r not*r lawful*r for*r anyone*ir to*r eat*r except*r the*r priests,*r and*r he*r also*r gave*r it*r to*r those*r who*r were*r with*r him?”*r
Jesus said to them, “The*r Sabbath*r was*r made*r for*r man,*r and*r not*r man*r for*r the*r Sabbath.*r
So*r the*r Son*r of*r Man*r is*r Lord*r even*r of*r the*r Sabbath.”*r
